name: DNA Shift
effect:
Devotees of the Virus may call upon 'DNA Shift' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, allowing them to access one of the following trades: 
- +2 Strength and Special | -2 Defense and Sp. Def
- +2 Defense and Sp. Def | -2 Strength and Special
- +2 Dexterity | -1 Strength, Special, Defense, and Sp. Def
